Name: Pineapple Blossom
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with pineapple wedge on rim.
Review: Richly flavoured but drier than you might expect.
Nutrition: One serving of Pineapple Blossom contains 201 calories
